name: CLUSTERSIDE
description:
This game is my first try at a fully functioning game, so do not expect it to be excellent. I also do not know if this will work.

You must find and escape from this facility you find yourself trapped in, eliminating all enemies in your way. Always remember that your gun is key to any situation. 

Some secret areas are hidden across the levels, which hold surprises. 

This game has a few known issues that I cannot seem to fix, such as a few enemies on the second level being unkillable, but also unable to damage you. Bugs like this usually fix themselves after you restart the level
